name: MSCRMCopySolutionComponents
description: Adds components from a given solution to another solution if not present
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: This can be used to add components from a transfer solution to a main solution

inputs.name: fromSolutionName
inputs.label: From Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the source solution

inputs.name: toSolutionName
inputs.label: To Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the target solution

inputs.name: includePatches
inputs.label: Include Patches
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true will include components from patches solutions
